description: The internal service areas face significant pressure to change, with low levels of standardization and digitalization, leaving them unable to meet current and future demands. A digital service portal is intended to create efficient, transparent, and user-friendly processes, unify service quality, reduce administrative workload, and improve employee satisfaction. It will serve as a central access point for all target groups, providing information, chatbot support, and automated routing for requests that cannot be resolved directly. This establishes the foundation for extensive automation of transactional processes and positions the organization for improved performance and future readiness.
requiredSkills: Holistic digitalization competence across strategy, organization, and technology
Program and portfolio management expertise (IT architecture, project and portfolio management)
Design Thinking and user-centered design (including Persona development)
Product management and macro-level architecture design
Creation of business logic, interfaces, and conceptual solution designs
Quality assurance of requirements and conceptual documentation
Workshop facilitation and stakeholder communication, including management reporting
Support for software architecture, development, and project management
Java Spring Boot and microservice architecture development
SQL experience with Oracle or MariaDB
Experience with cloud-native platforms (OpenShift, Kubernetes, Docker)
optionalSkills: UI development with JavaScript or Angular
